surprises.title: Rainbow Rabbit Day!
surprises.message: Did you know rabbits can see almost 360 degrees around them? They're like superheroes!
surprises.funFact: A rabbit's teeth never stop growing - they can grow 5 inches per year!

surprises.title: Starry Bunny Night!
surprises.message: Rabbits can jump 3 feet high and 10 feet long! That's like jumping over a car!
surprises.funFact: Baby rabbits are called kittens or kits - just like baby cats!

surprises.title: Artistic Rabbit Day!
surprises.message: Rabbits do a happy dance called a 'binky' when they're super excited!
surprises.funFact: Rabbits can't throw up, so they have to be careful about what they eat!

surprises.title: Space Hopper Day!
surprises.message: Rabbits can run up to 35 miles per hour - that's faster than a race car in the city!
surprises.funFact: Rabbits are crepuscular - they're most active at dawn and dusk!

surprises.title: Musical Bunny Day!
surprises.message: Rabbits purr when they're happy, just like cats do!
surprises.funFact: A group of rabbits is called a 'fluffle' - isn't that adorable?

surprises.title: Flower Power Rabbit!
surprises.message: Rabbits have 28 teeth and they love to chew on things!
surprises.funFact: Rabbits can see behind themselves without turning their heads!

surprises.title: Frosty Bunny Day!
surprises.message: Rabbits keep warm in winter with their super fluffy fur!
surprises.funFact: Wild rabbits live in underground tunnel systems called warrens!
